properties.areaDesc: Lauderdale, TN; Tipton, TN; Mississippi, AR
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 10 at 12:09PM CST until January 26 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Memphis TN
properties.description:
The National Weather Service has issued a Flood Warning for the
Mississippi River.

The National Weather Service in Memphis TN has issued a

* Flood Warning for
the Mississippi River at Osceola
* from Tuesday January 14 until Saturday January 25.
* At 11 AM Friday the stage was...27.4 feet.
* Moderate flooding is forecast.
* Maximum forecast stage of 33.5 feet on Sunday January 19.
* Flood stage is 28.0 feet.
* Forecast to rise above flood stage by Tuesday January 14 and
continue to rise to near 33.5 feet by Sunday January 19. The river
will fall below flood stage by Saturday January 25.
At 34.0 feet, In Tennessee, Highway 19 is flooding at Johnson Lake.
Houses and farmsteads just west of the north end of T. Rossinger Road
are beginning to flood. Oscar Griggs Road, Conner Road, and Long Hole
Road are beginning to flood. Western sections of Grammer Road are
beginning to flood, making evacuation from homesteads difficult..
properties.instruction:
A followup Flood Statement will be issued this evening or sooner if
conditions warrant.

For graphical river and flood information...please go to
www.weather.gov and click near Memphis on the map, then select Rivers
and Lakes.

Do not drive through flooded areas...turn around don't drown.

Stay tuned to your weather radio and your local news media for the
latest river information.
